lore.block.aether_unity.aether_mud: A squelchy soil comprised of Aether Dirt. These can be smelted into Packed Aether Mud, which can be used to make some nice decorative bricks!
lore.block.aether_unity.aether_mud_brick: The hardened variant of Aether Mud. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
The hardened variant of Aether Mud. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Holystone Bricks. Walls can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
The hardened variant of Aether Mud. These can be used as a building block, or they can be turned into decorative bricks!
lore.block.aether_unity.ambrosium_campfi: A campfire made of Ambrosium. You can use this to cook meat, or as a signal or light source!
lore.block.aether_unity.coarse_aether_di: The coarse variation of Aether Dirt.
lore.block.aether_unity.flutemoss_block: The Aether's native moss species. This can be grown with Bone Meal!
lore.block.aether_unity.flutemoss_carpet: A thin, blanket-like layer of Flutemoss. This is produced when growing Flutemoss with Bone Meal!
lore.block.aether_unity.golden_oak_leaf_: A pile of Golden Oak Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
lore.block.aether_unity.packed_aether_mu: The hardened variant of Aether Mud. These can be used as a building block, or they can be turned into decorative bricks!
lore.block.aether_unity.short_aether_gra: Blades of the Aether's grass. It feels slightly cool to the touch.
lore.block.aether_unity.skyroot_leaf_pil: A pile of Skyroot Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
